code: import{createSelector}from"reselect";var selectShop=function selectShop(state){return state.shop;};export var shopCollection=createSelector([selectShop],function(shop){return shop.collections;});export var selectCollectionForPreview=createSelector([shopCollection],function(collections){return Object.keys(collections).map(function(key){return collections[key];});});export var selectCollection=function selectCollection(collectionUrlPram){return createSelector([shopCollection],function(collections){return collections[collectionUrlPram];});};
